reference.title: Getting the Application Path from Execution Environment

section.p:
The following code is used for getting the application path from execution environment:# Get installed Activate Path & check "/Activate_batch.bat" is present execEnvData = await action.getExecEnv() onboardedApps = execEnvData.json["installedApplications"]
appConfig = await getApplicationLatestVersionConfig(onboardedApps, "Activate") activatePath = appConfig['installationPath']
activateAppPath = os.path.dirname(activatePath) + "/Activate_batch.bat" print(activateAppPath)
